Package org.treetank.service.xml.shredder Description

Shredder Package

All classes in this package are for getting data into Treetank. This includes the import of single XML Instances plus the the possibility to shred several independant versions into Treetank. Furthermore convenience classes for jdbc-data are provided.

Author:
Marc Kramis, University of Konstanz, Sebastian Graf, University of Konstanz
